apis_cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS) for cloud infrastructure

evidence.claim: Hillcrest Health Services utilizes AWS for their cloud solutions.
The company is committed to HIPAA compliance, ensuring secure handling of patient data.
Hillcrest integrates health data using FHIR standards.
API integration patterns are studied in their engineering summaries.

icp.icp_reason: Sufficient evidence of using EDI and X12 transactions for health data exchange.
matched_use_cases: data exchange between payers and providers
